summary: A nice Breton lady at the Throat of the World will gladly take your money to pay off bounties at no extra charge.
descriptionHtml:
So, you got caught during that Dark Brotherhood assassination, eh? Have no fear, your liberator is here! Her name is Elvija and she\'s here for YOU! During her stay in Skyrim, she\'s developed connections to the people with the real power in each of the major holds, and she\'ll gladly take your money to pay off your bounties with them if only you\'ll just leave her alone.

The mod basically adds a female Breton in nice clothes to the Throat of the World. She\'ll stand around, not doing anything, until you talk to her. Currently she\'ll offer to either let you pay off bounties or fence stolen goods, but the fencing part hasn\'t been implemented quite yet. Her location, race, clothing, and exact dialogue are all subject to change as I get a better feel for how exactly to implement everything I want to do.

-VERSION HISTORY-
v1.0: Female adult Breton at the Throat of the World. Will only allow you to pay off bounties.

-FUTURE PLANS-
v1.1: Add fencing options.
author: OmtraSpectral
